headline: Is Eversource Energy (ES) Still Attractive After Its 25.6% One Year Share Price Gain?
summary: Wondering whether Eversource Energy's current share price still offers value, or if most of the opportunity has already been priced in? This article walks you through what the numbers are saying. The stock is currently at US$69.13, with a 1 year return of 25.6%, alongside more muted moves of a 0.6% decline over 7 days and a 1.6% gain over the last month and year to date. Recent market attention has centered on Eversource Energy as investors weigh its role in the utilities sector and how it...
